reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Participation of Caribbean representatives in the Course on Multilateral Environmental Agreements in Grenada

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to facilitate the participation of up to eight (8) Caribbean representatives (from St. Vincent and the Grenadines Barbados Haiti Cuba Antigua and Barbuda Trinidad and Tobago and St. Lucia or other Caribbean countries in the case of cancellations) in the Course on Multilateral Environmental Agreements organized in Grenada 19-31 August 2012 by the University of Eastern Finland and UNEP. The specific theme of the course is ?Ocean Governance?. The Course transfers past experience in the field of international environmental law to current and future negotiators of multilateral environmental agreements (MEAs). In addition the Course provides a forum to foster North-South co-operation and to take stock of recent developments in negot iations as well as in implementation of MEAs and diplomatic practices in the international environmental arena.
